name: Small Bobina Bobble Mirror - Flax
description: Our Bobina Mirrors are inspired by bobbin furniture – otherwise known as spool furniture – from the late 17th century. This style had legs that were generally lathe-turned into ornamental shapes in order to make a feature of them. Drawing on this characteristic, the frame of our Small Bobina Bobble Mirror is hand carved from mango wood into pleasing spherical shapes, which is then hand painted a neutral cream shade and finished with a high gloss which accentuates its form.
